<<<<<<< HEAD
Gospel order revived being an answer to a book lately set forth by ... Increase Mather ... entituled, The order of the gospel, &c ... / by sundry ministers of the gospel in New England. Colman, Benjamin, 1673-1747. Pemberton, Ebenezer, 1672-1717. Woodbridge, Timothy, 1656-1732. Bradstreet, Simon, 1671-1741.
[9], 40 p.
Printed [by William Bradford], [New York] : 1700.
Collaboration on authorship has been ascribed at various times to Timothy Woolbridge, Benjamin Colman, Simon Bradstreet and Ebenezer Pemberton. Errata: p. [1] Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
=======

[9], 40 p.
Printed [by William Bradford], [New York] : 1700.
Collaboration on authorship has been ascribed at various times to Timothy Woolbridge, Benjamin Colman, Simon Bradstreet and Ebenezer Pemberton. Errata: p. [1] Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
